column1: Smoque BBQ////Obviously I like Smoque. It's impossible not to like Smoque unless you lack tastebuds. However
column2: I do not LOVE Smoque like so many others do. Yes
column3: it's better than most BBQ places around here. Yes
column4: it's probably the best BBQ place in Chicago. However
column5: Chicago isn't necessarily a BBQ Mecca (see KC
column9: Austin) and a lot of other places in the city are nearly as good as Smoque.
